## **Michigan Polls and Voting History**

As we said, the Presidential Voting in Michigan has been Democratic until Donald Trump made history.



![Michigan polls and election odds ](/images/uploads/michigan-voting-history-michigan-polls.png "Michigan polls and election odds")

It smells like a swing back to the blue team doesn't it?

Trump won by the tiniest margin in 2016 and will likely struggle to hold onto the 16 Elecotral Votes in 2020.

The FiveThirtyEight** [Michigan polls](https://projects.fivethirtyeight.com/polls/president-general/michigan/)** show the same story.

Trump is in trouble. But there's plenty of time up the sleeve. Plus we're sure the polls showed a similar blue lean in 2016.

However, there's no question the Democratic party will go into election night as strong favorites.
